pages.text: Intead of getting $(item)Alkahest/$ from that $(item)Extractor/$, what I got was transported to this strange place. It's so dark I can't even see my own hands, but I hope that $(item)Divining Stone/$ has some use, if I still have it around somewhere.
The locals don't seem too keen on interacting with me, but I swear I catch glimpses of them from time to time. I really need to find someone to explain to me what all this is about.
